Public Member Functions

DdMd::Atom Class Reference
Chemical Structure

Detailed Description

A point particle.

Each Atom has position, vector, and force Vector objects, an integer atom type Id, and a global integer id. Each Atom has an associated Mask object.

Definition at line 29 of file ddMd/chemistry/Atom.h.
